items.sentence: Tom admitted he didn't really want to do that.
Tom admitted he was the one who had done that.
I doubt very seriously Tom would ever do that.
I doubt very seriously Tom will be doing that.
There isn't any doubt Tom will do that for us.
I doubt Tom is still interested in doing that.
I just assumed everybody was going to do that.
I assume that Tom would be willing to do that.
I hope we can find the opportunity to do that.
I was kind of surprised Tom said he'd do that.
